project.name: TouchSync
project.description: Premium haptic intimacy app for long-distance couples combining real-time touch with relationship growth tracking using adorable heart characters
project.target_market: South Africa (Cape Town-Johannesburg LDR couples), expanding globally
project.unique_value_proposition: Only couples app combining real-time haptic touch intimacy with heart character-based relationship growth tracking and voice-based deep questions
project.app_icon: Embracing hearts in glassmorphism container (Logo 2) with dark charcoal background

paired.weakness: No haptic/physical touch, no character system

obimy.weakness: No structured relationship growth, flat 2D characters

between.weakness: No real-time intimacy or haptics, no gamification

touchsync_differentiators: Premium 3D heart characters with glassmorphism aesthetic (not flat 2D)
Haptic drawing canvas with real-time partner feedback
Heart character-based connection system (not abstract rings)
Streak freeze system with anxiety reduction
Premium sensory patterns (nature sounds as haptics)

1_haptic_drawing_canvas.description: Real-time drawing canvas where finger movements translate to haptic vibrations on partner's phone
technical_requirements: UIKit touch tracking with CoreGraphics path rendering
Firebase Realtime Database for sub-100ms latency
Core Haptics API for vibration pattern generation
Canvas clear: single tap, Hold hands: double tap (continuous pulse)
1_haptic_drawing_canvas.visual_design: Full-screen dark canvas with subtle crimson border, heart characters watch from top corners
1_haptic_drawing_canvas.user_flow: Open app ‚Üí Draw with finger ‚Üí Partner feels each stroke instantly as vibration ‚Üí Tap to clear

2_haptic_gesture_library.description: 5 preset touch patterns users can send with one tap
technical_requirements: Core Haptics CHHapticEngine
Preset patterns stored as JSON in Bundle
One-tap send via Firebase Cloud Functions

3_home_screen_widget.description: Live widget showing last touch received with timestamp and heart character preview

widget_types.displays: Last gesture icon + time ago + small heart character + 'Touch Back' button
Both heart characters + last 3 touches with timestamps + partner status indicator

technical_requirements: WidgetKit with TimelineProvider
App Intent for 'Touch Back' button deep link
Background refresh every 5 minutes
Glassmorphism effect: 15% opacity, 20px blur, #FF6B35 background

4_availability_status.description: Simple toggle showing partner's current availability with visual heart character state

states.meaning: Ready to receive touches and respond
Will see touches but may not respond immediately
Do not disturb - touches queued for morning

technical_requirements: SwiftUI Toggle with three-state picker
Firebase Realtime Database sync
Widget shows partner status with last updated timestamp

5_touch_history_timeline.description: Scrollable daily log of all touches exchanged with glassmorphism cards

display_format.card_content: Gesture icon + time sent/received + 'Replay' button + heart character reaction
display_format.replay_function: Tap to feel the haptic pattern again
display_format.favorite_function: Star icon to save special touches

technical_requirements: Core Data persistence with timestamps
LazyVStack for performance with 100+ items
Archive after 30 days (premium: unlimited storage)

6_heart_character_system.description: Two adorable 3D heart characters representing the couple, replacing ring system

visual_design.primary_display: Home screen top section shows both hearts
visual_design.connection_visualization: Glowing line or hands holding between hearts
animation_states: Active touching: Hearts lean closer with glow
Receiving touch: Partner heart brightens and bounces
Perfect day: Hearts embrace with sparkle particles

customization.free_tier: Basic heart shapes with dot eyes and smile
premium_unlocks: Level 100: Seasonal outfits and special effects

technical_requirements: SwiftUI Canvas with custom Shape rendering
Lottie animations for complex movements
CloudKit sync for customization across devices

7_connection_meter_system.description: Visual progress bar showing daily connection goals with heart characters

display.location: Below heart characters on home screen
display.visualization: Hearts holding hands with progress bar bridge between them
display.progress_fill: Gradient from deep crimson ‚Üí rose gold ‚Üí soft amber

daily_goals.description: Respond to 3 partner touches within 2 hours

perfect_day.visual: Hearts embrace with sparkle animation (perfect_day_celebration.png icon)
perfect_day.message: Perfect Day! Your bond is strongest today üíï

8_streak_system.description: Daily streak counter with milestone rewards and freeze tokens

display.location: Top of home screen below status bar

freeze_system.usage: Auto-applies when both partners miss completing any goal
freeze_system.display: ‚ùÑÔ∏è icon with count next to streak

technical_requirements: User Defaults for streak count with daily check
CloudKit sync to prevent data loss
Push notification at 9 PM if goals not complete

9_leveling_system.description: XP-based progression with relationship milestone tiers

relationship_tiers.heart_visual: Hearts can hold hands, rich animations
Hearts merge into shared glow during sessions

level_up_animation.visual: XP star icon (xp_star.png) bursts into particles
level_up_animation.modal: Shows new tier name, heart character upgrade, unlocked features

display.progress_bar: Visual bar showing XP progress to next level

primary.usage: User heart character, primary interactions, passionate moments

secondary.usage: Partner heart character, warmth, secondary UI elements

accent.usage: Connection glow, CTAs, highlights, active states

trust_layer.usage: Premium features, sleeping status, quality goal

background.usage: Dark mode base across entire app, app icon background

technical_architecture.backend: Firebase (Realtime Database, Cloud Functions, Authentication, Cloud Messaging, Firestore)
technical_architecture.data_persistence: Core Data for local, CloudKit for sync
technical_architecture.widgets: WidgetKit with TimelineProvider and App Intents
technical_architecture.analytics: Firebase Analytics + RevenueCat for subscription tracking

monetization.positioning: Premium tier between obimy ($2.99) and Paired ($14.99) - signals quality without overpricing
